problem.p: While the object is in uniform circular motion, the mechanical energy of the object is conserved because:

choicegroup.choice: All the forces acting on it are internal.
All the forces acting on it are conservative and their effects are accounted for by the potential energy.
All the forces acting on it are at right angles to its direction of motion.
The net force acting on the object is zero.
The statement is false. The mechanical energy of the object is not conserved.
